entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
